other_title: あいまい！萌えCanちぇんじ！ (Japanese)
萌えCanちぇんじ！～ゼロストーリー～ (Japanese)
plot: In a near future, Kiyan Chie and Anna Moeki have just been hired by the AMB Company as "navi girls" to promote a new service called Moe Can Change. They get to know each other as they test this wacky new service that allows people to change their outfits instantly simply by using a smartphone.
opening_theme: "NO RULE ~ Cho-Listen!(NO RULE ～超Listen！)" by Rina Hidaka
ending_theme: "Hōkago o Renji" by Arte Refact ft. Mitsuki Nakae
